name: Knight of Grief, Grania
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle that this unit attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Blaster" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) by the cost of your vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and put this card into your hand.
flavor: Even if everyone is gone, I'll still be by your side.

name: Tangle Venerer
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll capture them with a two-layered trap that they can't escape from.

name: Blue Artillery Dragon, Inlet Pulse Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a grade 3 or greater vanguard, if it was the first battle of this turn, and your vanguard is "Flagship Dragon, Flagburg Dragon", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.[AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if the total number of attacks this turn is four or more, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and draw a card.

name: Sunrise Egg
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Elementaria Sanctitude
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel
[CONT]:You may only have one "Elementaria Sanctitude" in a deck. 

If your opponent's vanguard has "Triple Drive", this ability can be played without paying the cost.
Play this with [COST][discard a card from hand] if your vanguard is grade 3 or less!
Choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. Remove this card.

name: Grand March of Full Bloom, Lianorn
